sentences.sContent: There is an element of exhibitionism in the parents' performance too.
sentences.sCn: 这对父母的表现中也有一种出风头癖的成分。

words.tran: 展览，显示；展览会；展览品
裸露症患者；倾向自我宣传的人；喜欢出风头的人
展出者；获得奖学金的学生

trans.tranCn: 自我宣传癖, 喜出风头癖, 裸露癖
trans.tranOther: a medical condition that makes someone want to show their sexual organs in public places
